name: Elf Pets Virtual Reindeer — The Elf on the Shelf
name_original: Elf Pets Virtual Reindeer — The Elf on the Shelf
description:
Elf Pets Virtual Reindeer — The Elf on the Shelf is an arcade game developed by The Elf on the Shelf®.
You can play Elf Pets Virtual Reindeer — The Elf on the Shelf on Android. The game is sold via Google Play.
